data.title: La Robla → Bilbao by Train from €67.60
data.meta_description: Travel by train from La Robla to Bilbao in 8h 37m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for La Robla to Bilbao today.
data.text:
Want to travel from La Robla to Bilbao by train? Start your journey with us.

The train from La Robla to Bilbao usually takes 10 hours 40 minutes on average to travel 140 miles (225 km), although the quickest services can take as little as 8 hours 37 minutes. You can expect to find 2 trains per day running on this popular route. As there aren’t any direct services running between La Robla and Bilbao, you’ll need to make 2 changes on your way to Bilbao. You can choose to travel with AVE or Renfe to get to Bilbao – both train companies offer modern comfortable services that will whisk you there in no time.

To help you get the best train deals, we'll highlight the cheapest train ticket prices from La Robla to Bilbao in our Journey Planner. Just remember, the sooner you book your tickets, the more you'll save, as advance tickets start from €67.60.

Keep reading for more information about the train journey to Bilbao, including FAQs, timetables with first and last train times and tips on booking cheap train tickets. If you’re ready to book, just start a search for tickets with us today.
